template<typename T>
void printvec(vector<T> a){
	for(long long i=0;i<a.size();i++)
		cout<<a[i]<<" ";
	cout<<endl;
}

unsigned long long choose(long long a,long long b)
{
    long long c=1,i;
    for(i=b+1;i<=a;i++)
    {
        c=c*i;
    }
    for(i=2;i<=a-b;i++)
    {
        c=c/i;
    }
    return c;
}

int main(){
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--){
		int a,b;
		scanf("%d %d",&a,&b);
		if(b>=a/2)
			printf("%lld\n",choose(a,b));
		else
			printf("%lld\n",choose(a,a-b));
	}
	return 0;
}
